text: A 35-year-old school teacher was fatally knocked down near Karimangalam here on Sunday. The victim, Jeganathan, a computer teacher in a private school, was riding his two-wheeler with a colleague when the accident occurred. Jeganathan was thrown off the vehicle after being knocked down by a lorry and died on the spot. The pillion rider was admitted with grievous injuries to Dharmapuri government medical college hospital.
title: Killed in accident
